amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for expenses of the Federal Prison System by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by offset) for expenses necessary of the Federal Prison System by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 257 (Roll no. 329).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Stearns.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 257 (Roll no. 329).
